---
category: news
title: "Quantum Surgical makes its first surgical robot sale in the U.S."
excerpt: "Popular Equipment Finance (DBA K2 Capital Group), a leader in equipment financing solutions, acquired the Epione robot. The company works with healthcare organizations across the U.S., including a cancer center that used Epione in May 2023. That cancer center now entered into a lease with K2 for the Epione system, the company announced last week."
